definitions.description: Of a reddish brown color, or (by some called) a red gray; of the color composed of blue, red, and yellow in equal strength, but unequal proportions, namely, two parts of red to one each of blue and yellow; also, of a yellowish brown color.
A russet color; a pigment of a russet color.
Cloth or clothing of a russet color.
A country dress; -- so called because often of a russet color.
An apple, or a pear, of a russet color; as, the English russet, and the Roxbury russet.
